Name: orbital periostitis
Definition: An acute orbital inflammation that is characterized by inflammation of the periosteum of the orbit.

Name: orbital osteomyelitis
Definition: An acute orbital inflammation that is characterized by inflammation of the medullary cavity of orbital bone that eventually spreads to the periosteum.

Name: orbital tenonitis
Definition: An acute orbital inflammation that is characterized by inflammation of the capsule of Tenon.

Name: orbital cellulitis
Definition: An acute orbital inflammation that is characterized by painful orbital mass and has_symptom eyelid edema
